      • setVisible

        boolean setVisible(boolean visible)
        Encapsulation of the visibility toggle implementation as an action.
        Parameters:
        visible - boolean true is visible, false invisible.
        Returns:
        success or failure of setting the visibility.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Gets the current visibility state.
        Returns:
        true if the item is visible, false if invisible.
